articles.title: Sania Mirza bids adieu to Australia Open with quarterfinal loss in mixed doubles - The Indian Express
articles.description: Sania Mirza, partnering American Rajeev Ram, lost the match 4-6, 6-7 to wildcard entries Fourlis and Kubler in one hour 30 minutes.

articles.title: Alcohol consumption among men drops during pandemic, but problem drinking rises - EurekAlert
articles.description: A new study that has tracked Americans’ alcohol consumption during the COVID-19 pandemic finds that drinking has declined among men, while it remained steady among women. Researchers found that alcohol-related problems increased during the pandemic, by 49% fo…
articles.content:
Alcohol consumption during the coronavirus pandemic declined among men, while it remained steady among women, according to a new RAND Corporation study.
